Values: ['Fill in your [Returning Invitation] code on the [Returning to Battle] event page during the event from July 15 to August 5 for a bunch of sweet rewards!']

['Brand new update [A New Divide] for Punishing: Gray Raven has arrived! Participate now to earn massive rewards! Returning players will gain extra rewards when they sign in from July 15 to August 5 and fill in their Invite Code in the [Returning to Battle] event!']
